metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5228 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The service daemon in CRIU creates log and dump files insecurely, which allows local users to create arbitrary files and take ownership of existing files via unspecified vectors related to a directory path.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5228` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

criu - 2.6-1ubuntu1~ubuntu16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: criu package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6-1ubuntu1~ubuntu16.04.2').
